tool_description: Use this API to convert any JSON to Excel Format (XLSX). Open for any suggestions.
name: JSON to Excel Converter
title: JSON to Excel Converter

api_list.name: Convert
api_list.description: Copy your JSON string and send the API request to get the XLSX file (Excel file).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://json-to-excel-converter.p.rapidapi.com/api/json-to-excel/convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "json-to-excel-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://json-to-excel-converter.p.rapidapi.com/api/json-to-excel/convert"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
